name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Cybersecurity Engineer with over 10 years of experience in developing secure systems and managing cloud infrastructure. Proficient in **Network Security**, **Authentication**, **Identity Management**, **Risk Assessment**, and implementing **Vulnerability Assessment** tools such as **Nmap**, **Nessus**, and **OpenVAS**. Skilled in enhancing system integrity through **Firewalls**, **IDS**, and **IPS** while ensuring compliance with frameworks like **MITRE ATT&CK** and **NIST**. Adept at scripting in **Python**, **Bash**, and **PowerShell** to automate security processes and strengthen defenses. A proven track record of managing cybersecurity initiatives in renowned organizations like VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, delivering high-quality solutions that prioritize both efficiency and security.
